alert.note: Alert for Pickens; Sumter (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued December 29 at 7:27PM CST until December 29 at 10:00PM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM CST FOR SOUTHWESTERN PICKENS...NORTHERN GREENE AND NORTHWESTERN SUMTER COUNTIES... At 727 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Panola, or 15 miles south of Aliceville, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Union, New West Greene, Mantua, Panola, West Greene, Knoxville, Geiger, Snoddy, Warsaw, New Mount Hebron, Clinton, Pleasant Ridge and Lewiston. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CST for west central Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
